Sentencas: A combination of temperature-programmed (TP) and isothermal experiments were performed on the candidate solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) anode materials, La(0.8)Ca(0.2)Cr(0.9)X(0.1)O(3) (X=Ni, Co), to investigate their suitability for use with dry methane feeds.
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA(0.8)CA(0.2)CR(0.9)X(0.1)O(3) (X=NI, CO) IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES

Sentencas: Comparing with the behaviour of the unsubstituted material, La0.8Ca0.2CrO3
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA(0.8)CA(0.2)CR(0.9)X(0.1)O(3) (X=NI, CO) IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES

Sentencas: [1], the Ni and Co doping were found to have a marked modifying effect on the ease and extent of reduction of the materials.
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA(0.8)CA(0.2)CR(0.9)X(0.1)O(3) (X=NI, CO) IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES

Sentencas: The total extent of reduction was higher than for the unsubstituted oxide.
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA(0.8)CA(0.2)CR(0.9)X(0.1)O(3) (X=NI, CO) IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES

Sentencas: Two main reaction regimes were identified, as for the unsubstituted material, involving complete oxidation and methane dissociation.
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA(0.8)CA(0.2)CR(0.9)X(0.1)O(3) (X=NI, CO) IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES

Sentencas: Complete oxidation only occurred over the pre-oxidised material.
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA(0.8)CA(0.2)CR(0.9)X(0.1)O(3) (X=NI, CO) IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES

Sentencas: When reduced at high temperatures, the Ni-substituted material displayed behaviour characteristic of both La0.8Ca0.2CrO3
